product_metadata.plan_type: Non-linked, Non-participating, Individual Life Insurance Savings Plan
product_metadata.key_positioning: Life cover + guaranteed maturity sum for family security goals

product_summary.objective: Goal Suraksha is an easy-to-buy guaranteed savings plan that provides life cover during the policy term and pays a Guaranteed Sum Assured on Maturity along with Guaranteed Additions if all premiums are paid.
key_highlights: Option to alter Premium Payment Frequency
Settlement option available for maturity payouts
Waiting period applicable for non-accidental death

core_benefits.details: On survival till maturity, Guaranteed Sum Assured on Maturity plus Guaranteed Additions is payable, provided all premiums are paid.
On maturity, Guaranteed Additions are paid as a multiple of one Annualized Premium.
core_benefits.condition: Only payable if all due premiums are paid and policy is not lapsed/paid-up.
core_benefits.note: Guaranteed Addition factors published on company website

core_benefits.details: Sum Assured on Death payable after waiting period or due to accident during waiting period.
core_benefits.sum_assured_on_death: Higher of (SA Multiple × Annual Premium) OR (Sum Assured).
core_benefits.waiting_period_non_accidental: If death occurs during waiting period (non-accident), only 100% of premiums paid is returned.
core_benefits.guaranteed_floor: Death Benefit will not be less than 105% of Total Premiums Paid.

core_benefits.details: If Sum Assured multiple of 7×/5× is chosen, policy gets additional Guaranteed Additions (higher maturity benefit).
core_benefits.note: Mark-up factors available on company website

policy_loan.loan_deduction: Outstanding loan + interest deducted from maturity/death/surrender benefit

settlement_option.risk_cover_rule: No risk cover during installment period
settlement_option.pv_withdrawal_option: Policyholder can withdraw remaining installments as Present Value lump sum

surrender_and_lapse_rules.surrender_allowed: Anytime after completion of 1st policy year with one full premium paid
surrender_and_lapse_rules.surrender_value: Higher of Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV) or Special Surrender Value (SSV)

paid_up_and_revival_rules.lapse_rule: If 1 full year premium not paid → policy lapses after grace period
paid_up_and_revival_rules.paid_up_rule: If surrender value acquired → policy converts to paid-up instead of lapsing
paid_up_and_revival_rules.paid_up_death_floor: 105% of premiums paid till paid-up date
paid_up_and_revival_rules.revival_period: Within 5 years from first unpaid premium due date

compliance_guardrails.waiting_period: First 90 days from risk commencement (except accident death).
compliance_guardrails.suicide_exclusion: Suicide within 12 months → nominee gets higher of 80% premiums paid or surrender value.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to prevailing tax laws.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_guardrails.rebate_prohibition: Rebate is prohibited under Section 41 of Insurance Act.

retrieval_chunks.text: At maturity, Guaranteed Sum Assured on Maturity plus Guaranteed Additions is paid if all premiums are paid.
Death Benefit is higher of SA multiple × annual premium or sum assured, with minimum 105% premium floor.
A 90-day waiting period applies. Non-accidental death during waiting period returns only premiums paid.
Loans up to 80% of surrender value available, interest 9% p.a., deducted from benefits at payout.
Maturity benefit can be received in installments over 5–15 years at 6.5%–7% interest; no risk cover during installments.
